"Design a laundry basket that doubles as a storage unit for small items like socks or jewelry."
"Create a laundry basket that can be easily converted into a seat for children while they watch TV or play video games."
"Design a laundry basket that has built-in drying racks so clothes can air dry instead of using a dryer."
"Create a laundry basket that is made from recycled materials and is biodegradable."
"Design a laundry basket that has a built-in ironing board so clothes can be ironed directly inside the basket."
